metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Every Little Step is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Every Little Step is written in the key of C♯ Dorian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 10th most popular key among Dorian keys and     the 46th most popular  among all keys. The C♯ Dorian scale is similar to the C♯ Minor scale except that its 6th note is a half step higher (A♯).  Chord progressions in Dorian have a characteristic sound due to the major quality of the chord built on the 4th scale degree. 

See the C♯ Dorian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
